thread.title: EzPayCheck 2015 Payroll Software Has Been Updated With Flexibility For New Health Care Facilities
thread.title_full: EzPayCheck 2015 Payroll Software Has Been Updated With Flexibility For New Health Care Facilities

author: Tammie Bernard
title: EzPayCheck 2015 Payroll Software Has Been Updated With Flexibility For New Health Care Facilities
text:
Medical facilities are having a hard time making a profit with the new health care policies. EzPaycheck payroll software from Halfpricesoft.com has released the 2015 paycheck software for medical offices. EzPaycheck can process employee payroll, vendor payments for supplies, W2, W3, 940 and 941 form filing as well as many other added bonus features. This software also allows for easy setup of employee information, tax calculation options, and calculating payroll. Several features are available in ezPaycheck 2015 which will simplify the mundane task of processing payroll for medical offices:
 Many medical offices do not have an accountant on staff. Ezpaycheck 2015’s new graphic interface is straightforward and user-friendly. The new form-level help buttons reduce the extensive learning curve for first time computer payroll software customers. This payroll software can handle paychecks for both salary employees and hourly rate contractors. It also supports unlimited employees at no extra charge so medical office owners need not worry about the cost when they hire new employees. ezPaycheck 2015 will support multiple accounts at no extra charge.
“We believe medical office facilities need simple, reliable and affordable software,” said Halfpricesoft.com founder Dr. Ge. " We intentionally updated ezPaycheck payroll tax software to accommodate new health care changes.”
Halfpricesoft.com designed EzPaycheck payroll tax software to be extremely easy to use and learn. The graphical interface and payroll features are so intuitive that users can start automating payroll processes within minutes of installing on their computer. There is no need for expert computer knowledge or accounting experience. New customers considering ezPaycheck 2012 can download and sample the payroll software without charge or obligation for up to 30 days at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp
EzPayCheck’s many time and money saving features include but are not limited to:
 Updated tax tables and tax rates for all 50 states, Washington D.C., and federal taxes Print paychecks using one of three check formats: check-in-middle, check-on-bottom or check-on-top Print paychecks with stubs on blank check stock or pre-printed checks Print Forms W2, W3, 940 and 941 Mask employee Social Security Numbers on check stubs Chock-Full of unique reporting features Data export for use with Halfpricesoft.com ezW2 or other compatible software Auto-fill for check data that speeds up payroll Support multiple accounts with no extra charge
Priced at only $89 per installation, ezPaycheck is affordable for any size business.
To start the 30-day free test drive, visit the site at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp
About Halfpricesoft.com
Halfpricesoft.com is a leading provider of small business software, including payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, check printing software, W2, software, 1099 software, and bar-code generating software. Today Software from halfpricesoft.com is trusted by thousands of users and help small business owners simplify their payroll processing and business management.
